original_title: Kerosene oil prices reduced from midnight today
original_body_lines: The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC) has reduced the prices of a litre of kerosene oil by Rs. 50 with effect from midnight today.
Accordingly, the new price of a litre of kerosene will be Rs. 305.
Meanwhile, the industrial kerosene oil has been reduced by Rs. 134 to Rs. 330 per litre.
The President's Media Division (PMD) said the CPC's proposal to lower the price of kerosene oil has been endorsed by President Ranil Wickremesinghe.
